meta.name: Flip Side
meta.description: In Flip Side two teams of players attempt to determine the sentiments of two distinct groups regarding the same issue. Teams make their selections from multiple-choice answers, and the correct choice secures the pot.

videos.title: Beep Beep!
videos.overview: Sisters Kenna and Kerri take on brothers Sam and Ryan.

videos.title: Packin' In Points
videos.overview: Married couple Kendra and Scott oppose friends Constance and Jon.
